Question: This person has three sisters, Lee Anne, Marian, and Cass.
Hints: This person is known for his Scientologist faith and for his support of the Church of Scientology.
This person followed up Top Gun with The Color of Money, which came out the same year, and which paired him with Paul Newman.
In mid-2011, this person started shooting the movie Rock of Ages, in which he played the character Stacee Jaxx.
